description of publisher-subscribe.

= Introduction =

publisher-subscribe provides a custom implementation of the Observer pattern. The Observer pattern is a well know way to loosely couple the domain with the environment.

In this implementation It is possible to publish a detailed publication which will propagate towards every general publication.
